languages.text: "Тебе есть чему у него поучиться: не обязательно нести все, что приходит в голову, особенно — в твою голову, ведьма".
languages.translation_comment:
Visited the Lord Inquisitor on Footfall.
Idira: "Ever since the Lord Captain paid a visit to Calcazar, I've had this... uneasy feeling. It feels wrong. As if... not everything has been said."

traits.locale_text: "Тебе есть чему у него поучиться: не обязательно нести все, что приходит в голову, особенно — в твою голову, ведьма".

languages.text: "You could learn something from him: one doesn't have to spout whatever pops into one's head, especially if it's your head, witch."
languages.translation_comment:
Visited the Lord Inquisitor on Footfall.
Idira: "Ever since the Lord Captain paid a visit to Calcazar, I've had this... uneasy feeling. It feels wrong. As if... not everything has been said."
languages.original_text: "Тебе есть чему у него поучиться: не обязательно нести все, что приходит в голову, особенно — в твою голову, ведьма".

traits.locale_text: "You could learn something from him: one doesn't have to spout whatever pops into one's head, especially if it's your head, witch."
"You could learn something from him: one doesn't have to spout whatever pops into one's head, especially if it's your head, witch."
"You could learn something from him: one doesn't have to spout whatever pops into one's head, especially if it's your head, witch."
"You could learn something from him: one doesn't have to spout whatever pops into one's head, especially if it's your head, witch."
"You could learn something from him: one doesn't have to spout whatever pops into one's head, especially if it's your head, witch."
"You could learn something from him: one doesn't have to spout whatever pops into one's head, especially if it's your head, witch."

languages.text: 「奴から少しは学べるだろう？思いついたことを何でも口にすればいいわけではない。それがお前の頭から出てくるものならなおさらだ、魔女」
languages.original_text: "You could learn something from him: one doesn't have to spout whatever pops into one's head, especially if it's your head, witch."

traits.locale_text: 「奴から少しは学べるだろう？思いついたことを何でも口にすればいいわけではない。それがお前の頭から出てくるものならなおさらだ、魔女」

languages.text: "Ihr könntet noch etwas von ihm lernen: Man muss nicht immer das Erste sagen, was einem Kopf schießt. Besonders, wenn es Euer Kopf ist, Hexe."
languages.original_text: "You could learn something from him: one doesn't have to spout whatever pops into one's head, especially if it's your head, witch."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könntet noch etwas von ihm lernen: Man muss nicht immer das Erste sagen, was einem Kopf schießt. Besonders, wenn es Euer Kopf ist, Hexe."

languages.text: « Vous devriez en prendre de la graine, sorcière : il n'est pas nécessaire de raconter tout ce qui nous passe par la tête, surtout quand il s'agit des horreurs qui emplissent la vôtre. »
languages.original_text: "You could learn something from him: one doesn't have to spout whatever pops into one's head, especially if it's your head, witch."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devriez en prendre de la graine, sorcière : il n'est pas nécessaire de raconter tout ce qui nous passe par la tête, surtout quand il s'agit des horreurs qui emplissent la vôtre. »

languages.text: «Podría aprender algo de él: uno no tiene por qué decir lo primero que se le venga a la cabeza, sobre todo si es su cabeza, bruja».
languages.original_text: "You could learn something from him: one doesn't have to spout whatever pops into one's head, especially if it's your head, witch."

traits.locale_text: «Podría aprender algo de él: uno no tiene por qué decir lo primero que se le venga a la cabeza, sobre todo si es su cabeza, bruja».

languages.text: “你还可以从他身上学到些东西：就算脑子里真的冒出了什么话，也没必要非说出来不可，尤其是你的脑子，女巫。”
languages.original_text: "You could learn something from him: one doesn't have to spout whatever pops into one's head, especially if it's your head, witch."

traits.locale_text: “你还可以从他身上学到些东西：就算脑子里真的冒出了什么话，也没必要非说出来不可，尤其是你的脑子，女巫。”

languages.text: "Ondan kafana her eseni söylememeyi öğrenebilirsin cadı. Özellikle o kafa, senin kafansa."
languages.original_text: "You could learn something from him: one doesn't have to spout whatever pops into one's head, especially if it's your head, witch."

traits.locale_text: "Ondan kafana her eseni söylememeyi öğrenebilirsin cadı. Özellikle o kafa, senin kafansa."

languages.original_text: "You could learn something from him: one doesn't have to spout whatever pops into one's head, especially if it's your head, witch."
